error.build-failure-message.zh: 非常抱歉，您的项目导出失败了。您可以阅读下方的日志，它可能包含了有关该问题的相关信息。您可能需要检查项目的一些设置，包括插件或应用程序签名等选项。或者检查网络连接情况。
error.build-failure-message.en: Unfortunately your project failed to build. The build log is included below in case it includes any information about the problem. You may need to adjust project settings, included plugins or application signing options.

error.storage-fail.zh: 无法导出到本地。可能因为此设备分配给 Construct 的存储空间已满，请尝试释放此设备的存储空间。
error.storage-fail.en: Unable to save export to disk. This build will not be available in the export manager past the end of this session. Your storage quota may be full. Try freeing up storage space on your device.

error.invalid-file.zh: 无法导入文件， 仅支持由C2或C3导出的 Cordova 项目。
error.invalid-file.en: Unable to import file. Only Cordova projects exported from C2 or C3 can be imported.
